const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "custom_limit_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        whitespace_five_token_limit: {
          tokenizer: "whitespace",
          filter: ["five_token_limit"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        five_token_limit: {
          type: "limit",
          max_token_count: 5,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
